topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547a718763687268ec390000#post_547a718763687268ec390000
[bq="Twisty"]"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547a714463687226da370100#post_547a714463687226da370100

like real life seeing it cut through people?

i saw it on t.v, but they are glorified, in real life katanas cant cut for shit through armor.

also they were cheaply made[/bq]
I have to correct something here; there's a difference between a sword made to cut through armor, swordproof armor and bulletproof armor.  Kevlar body armor or such isn't designed for swords or such; if you took a rapier or something you could totally cut through it(albeit not easily).  Swordproof armor looks totally different and has a completely different function.  There are some bulletproof body armor designed to also block swords, but let's face is when was the last time anyone on a battlefield used a sword on the battlefield? *cough* Jack Churchill aka "Mad Jack" *cough*
